content: welcome to the first ever black sheep wools knitalong a day out 2021 we ve wanted to do a knit along for so long and now seems exactly the right time to do it a day out is the perfect project to make together each week takes you on a journey around the roads and villages that surround black sheep wools we will explore different knitting techniques a little bit of local history and have lots of fun along the way the destination is fabulous too the colourways are named after the local cheshire villages of culcheth croft and winwick whilst the squares borrow from the lanes used to travel to the craft barn in these times when we can t visit new and favourite places easily we ve created this beautiful project to evoke a little of the fun of a journey to visit us this knit along blanket uses aran weight yarn in three different shades 18 sts and 24 row to 10cm measured over st st on 5mm needles or size required to achieve correct gauge more information on the black sheep wools website 1 we re now shipping from the uk to australia canada ireland japan new zealand south korea and usa kal dates - free downloads 26th february 2021 packs on sale shopping list download 9th march block 1 pdf 16th march block 2 pdf 23rd march block 3 pdf 30th march 2021 block 4 pdf 6th april 2021 block 5 pdf 13th april 2021 block 6 pdf 20th april 2021 block 7 pdf 27th april 2021 block 8 pdf 4th may 2021 block 9 pdf 11th may 2021 sew up and border 1 https //www blacksheepwools com/collections/a-day-out-knit-along
